import React,{useContext} from 'react' import BookContext from '../context/content/BookContext' import {useNavigate} from "react-router-dom" function Viewbook(props) { const navigate = useNavigate(); const context=useContext(BookContext); const {viewbooks}=context; const{image,title,author,price,description,tag}=viewbooks; return (

{author}

{title}

4 Reviews

{description}

{tag}

{description}

{description}

Color
Size
${price}
) } export default Viewbook
